text: Poor maintenance of facilities. Unit really look old. Cleanliness was so poor with blow flies around the chalet. We were having party and our food was all over with the blow flies. It was so disgusting. For customer service was good. We hope to see the management to do something about it.

The chalet is so run down.  Aircon is not really working.  Sofas got stain. Shower head holder also not working.  No small knife, no chopping board.  The rice cooker is rusty inside. Although got freezer, but the other fridge is small. Is not cheap to stay there.And the facilities are no good No choice as limited chalet with so 2 or 4 rooms. Why limit to only 3 vehicle passes. Unless overnight, then limit it. Will want to try out the Tee Side Chalet.  Am sure is better. Must walk to the  convinence  store to rent and return the MJ table for $38 for 1 night.  Is so heavy and the store owner  also not helpful.
A lovely place for a weekend with family & friends. Quiet, next to sea and lovely chalets. Can even have an outdoor BBQ. Pet-friendly chalets are also available.

Enjoy great staycation during December. Fantastic rooms complete with basic amenities. Coffee machine, rice cooker, state of art BBQ pit, fresh towel. You just can‚Äôt be wrong when stay inside here. Manning swimming poolside‚Ä¶Gosh what a way of fun at Loyang Besaq ‚ÄºÔ∏èüí•ü¶ç

We had a wonderful family retreat holiday cum birthday celebration for my niece at CSC Loyang Chalet Resort and it was truly a memorable experience!

The location is excellent providing a serene and relaxing atmosphere perfect for a getaway. The swimming pool was fantastic featuring a child-friendly water playground and kids' floaties which kept the little ones entertained for hours.

A big shoutout to the housekeeping team, who did a fantastic job ensuring our chalet was clean and comfortable throughout our stay. Our requests were attended to promptly, making us feel well taken care of. Special thanks to Mr. Guna, the housekeeping joint in charge, for his attentiveness and politeness. He was incredibly helpful and always ready to support us with our needs.

The resort also offers great amenities, making it an ideal place for both families and friends to relax and enjoy quality time together. We truly appreciate the excellent service and warm hospitality, and we look forward to returning for another stay!

#rafibhai
